name: Hivernation (manderdander)
description:
Welcome to Hivernation!

Backstory

You're the lone survivor of a hive that failed to prepare enough resources to survive the winter! You start your own hive and vow to do things right.

Objective

Gather enough resources from flowers to survive the winter.

Directions

To collect resources, have one of your bees go and touch a flower, then send that bee back to its hive to drop it off.

To move your bees, click on one and then click on where you want it to go.

To create bees, click the "BEE" button.

Tips

Avoid nasty wasps that threaten your adventuring bees! And be careful! They attack more frequently as the year goes on.

Watch out for bears, too! If one of those big lugs manages to make it to your hive, it's game over.

But the biggest threat is the winter season itself! When it comes, it will quickly drain all the resources you've collected thus far. But if you outlast it, you'll know you've built a hive that can stand the test of time!

The rarest and most valuable flowers spawn far away from your hive, so do your best to make the trip and get home safely!
